root.name: Leisure Suit Larry: Reloaded
root.description: ts not just the funniest game youve ever playedits also the most infamous video game of all time!Leisure Suit Larry in the Land of the Lounge Lizards was first released by Sierra On-Line in 1987 and be-came an international phenomenon. The lovable loser Larry Laffer -- a 40-year-old virgin in pursuit of losing his vir.um, finding true love -- and risque humor were unlike anything anyone had ever seen or played.
